resources.string: Your device storage is full. Please free up some space and try again.
You have made too many requests in a short period of time. Please wait and try again later.
The request has timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
No internet connection. Please check your network settings and try again.
A server error has occurred. Please try again later.
An error occurred while processing data. Please try again.
An unknown error has occurred. Please try again.
